column1: #Text=Kuvira says : " The State of Yi is now under the full protection of my army .
#Text=It 's good to have you back in the city .
#Text=And everyone is excited to see the Avatar again .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " What do you mean ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " No , we thought she was coming with you .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " Korra left the South Pole six months ago .
#Text=She said she was here in Republic City .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I assure you , your daughter is not here .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " Then where is she ?
